summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6176 for the improvement of The Alleys in Block 10, Greenwood Park Addition, being the alleys bounded by North 84th Street, North 85th Street, 1st Avenue Northwest and Greenwood Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87034 as amended by Ordinance No. 87228, several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
